message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.NE, cs.CE 

The paper discusses the use of deep learning techniques for finding near-optimal policies for a residential heating system and electric water heater. This involves the use of reinforcement learning, which falls under the category of machine learning. The paper also mentions the use of convolutional neural networks and recurrent neural networks, which are specific types of deep learning models. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science).
